note.p: Banker. Lived in Australia in the 1860s. Worked at the London and Provincial Bank, Portsea, in the 1870s.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/1132/73/38)
Correspondence vol. 19, letter from R. I. Thompson, 27 April 1871
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 23 June 2020)
Somerset, England, Church of England baptisms, 1813-1914 (Ancestry.com, accessed 23 June 2020)
